name: Blockz[WIP]
description:
Blockz is a puzzle html5 game made with Phaser framework.

The rule of the game is simple, sweep your finger/mouse in a direction to move also with the arrow keys in keyboard.

You have to go to the circle, this is the goal, by finding the right way.

Let's just stop talking, play the game and you will see how it plays.

If you found problems it's because the game is not completed, this is just a test :)
